review: I can't really knock the stars off for this but it runs Kodi pretty sluggishly but it was not really designed for that so oh well. I would look into disabling both hardware acceleration options. You have to go to Settings (make sure you are in expert mode) then video and hardware acceleration. Can't remember the options but I turned them both off and playback is smoother but not always perfect. I did the same for the Fire TV as well.
